tool.name: OrthoMCL Prepare FASTA file
tool.description: Prepare a FASTA file for use in OrthoMCL. The input is a pre-existing proteome FASTA file. The output is a proteome FASTA file that conforms to OrthoMCL requirements

param.name: proteome_fasta_file
param.label: Proteome FASTA file:
param.help: A Proteome FASTA file. Must be a set of proteins from exactly one proteome. The file must contain only protein sequences, where each sequence starts with a definition line. The first field in the definition line must be a unique identifier.

validator.message: Only letters, numbers, spaces and dashes are allowed in the name.
Please restrict the name to 100 characters or less.

tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool transforms a proteome FASTA file to a proteome FASTA file in the format required by OrthoMCL. It also validates the input FASTA.
